message:
Anyone working on anything cool? I just started a new project and decided to jump into CI while I was at it...just looking to see what others are doing with this radical Framework.

PS, I'm building an inventory application...but with a lot more frills.
My last 2 sites (http://tunefort.com & http://ginq.com) were built using Codeigniter. I sold both sites though.
@izadcmuda Pretty cool idea for the social movie reviews site. I like it :)
Just launched a beta of http://www.kareer.me. All freshly CI2 coded.
